title: Responsive Teaching Methods Workshop for Elementary Engineering Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A program strengthening elementary engineering design education competencies for pre-service teachers. Acquires methods to support students' creative problem-solving processes via responsive teaching strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more frameworks for designing elementary educational activities according to the engineering design process.
Learners can apply teaching strategies that observe students' thinking processes and provide responsive feedback in actual classroom scenarios.
Learners can analyze interactions within student teams solving engineering problems and propose customized support plans.
Learners can develop a blended instruction model that operates engineering design learning activities in a hybrid digital/analog environment.

resources: Engineering Design Kit (Including LEGO, Simple Mechanical Components)
Responsive Teaching Method Case Study Video Materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
